user_instruction: 'Send an update to Sarah (sarah@beaconofhope.org) about our latest intervention strategies. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest Intervention Strategies Update

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send me the most recent information on our intervention strategies? If it’s helpful, feel free to pull the details from your Notion workspace.

Thank you in advance, and let me know if you need anything from my end.

Best regards,  
Sarah  
Beacon of Hope Foundation  
sarah@beaconofhope.org

final_output:

Best regards,  
Sarah
